author: seamonkey82
content:
Now that the Kiln beaconchain explorer is back up and synced, here's the full dashboard for all 25 client pairs.  I've re-added the custom names, so you can click on each one and see which client pair each validator is running.
https://beaconchain.kiln.themerge.dev/dashboard?validators=104561,105230,105237,105244,105253,105257,105350,105351,105447,105529,105570,105571,105572,105575,105576,105620,105622,105627,105633,105901,106271,106273,106275,106482,106483
